quizzes.title: General Knowledge Quiz VI (50 Questions)
quizzes.description: Challenging but fair. New categories: Literature & Myth, Art & Architecture, Music & Performing Arts, Mathematics & Physics, Ancient Civilizations.

quizzes.title: General Knowledge Quiz VII (50 Questions)
quizzes.description: Challenging but fair. New categories: Sports & Games, Food & Drink, Business & Economics, Medicine & Human Body, Space & Astronomy.

quizzes.title: General Knowledge Quiz VIII (50 Questions)
quizzes.description: Challenging but fair. New categories: Language & Etymology, Inventions & Discoveries, Philosophy & Religion, Environment & Ecology, Exploration & Cartography.

quizzes.title: General Knowledge Quiz IX (50 Questions)
quizzes.description: Challenging but fair across literature, history, science, geography, and tech. No sports content.

quizzes.description: Challenging but fair across space, ideas, language, inventions, and cultural trivia.

quizzes.description: Challenging but fair across ancient/modern history, biology, geopolitics, and exploration.

quizzes.description: Challenging but fair across film/TV, games, architecture, economy, and natural wonders.

quizzes.title: General Knowledge Quiz XVI (50 Questions)
